articles.title: Ember's upcoming Travel Mug 2+ can be tracked in Apple's Find My app - Engadget
articles.description: Soon you'll be alerted if your left your Ember Travel Mug behind via Apple Find My..
articles.content: Apple's Find My app alerts iOS and Mac users when they've left an item behind or helps them locate something they've lost. Later this year, you'll be able to do just that with Ember's heated travel m… [+991 chars]
